Name: Vinyl Record
Description: Used to capture a monster. Better than nothing, you guess

Name: Casette Tape
Description: Used to capture a monster. Actually works decently

Name: CD
Description: Used to capture a monster. The best thing since sliced bread, in your opinion

Name: Memory Crystal
Description: Used to capture a monster without fail. Seems too advanced for your time. Who made it?

Name: Band-ade
Description: A bandage pre-soaked in lemonade. Heals a monster, but at what cost?

Name: Pink Band-ade
Description: A bandage pre-soaked in pink lemonade. Heals a monster better than a Band-ade does

Name: Normal Bandage
Description: A bandage not soaked in anything. Heals monsters the best, but isn't subsidized by the Lemony Cross

Name: Rock 'n' Roll
Description: Gets a monster pumped up, curing sleep or frozen status. Single use

Name: Smooth Jazz
Description: Soothes a monster, curing burn status. Single use

Name: Church Tunes
Description: Cures a monster's poison or paralyze status through the power of faith. Single use
